name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Anthony DIODORO, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Anthony DIODORO, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of December, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether accessing and viewing child pornography over the internet constitutes “control” of such pornography under 18 Pa.C.S. § 6312(d)?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
939 A.2d 290
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Anthony DIODORO, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 24, 2007.
